spiritsExplanation: The workout title 'Core Burn Express' and the description 'Fire up your core during plank exercises with Christie in this short, mat pilates workout' emphasize a focus on core strength and a pilates approach, suggesting a blend of structure and flow. The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit, with a score of 0.7, is evident through the mention of Pilates, a practice emphasizing smooth movement and coordination. The playlist featuring upbeat, rhythmic songs such as 'Wake Me Up' aligns with this spirit. 'Structured & Disciplined' scores 0.6 due to the technical nature of pilates and the structured format of plank exercises. The short duration (5 minutes 45 seconds) and the absence of an instructor name imply a session focused on quick, structured movements rather than deep relaxation, supporting these selections. The 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit is not relevant here, as the workout is 'On The Mat,' indicating an indoor setting. Similarly, 'High-Energy & Intense' and 'Soothing & Restorative' are less applicable given the workout's focus on core engagement rather than intensity or relaxation.
